instruction: Generate three lines of dialogue for a conversation between two characters.
input:
Characters: Two siblings
Location: A hospital waiting room 
Situation: Their father is in critical condition
output:
Sibling 1: I can't believe this is happening.
Sibling 2: I know. We just have to keep praying and hoping for the best.
Sibling 1: We can't give up until we know for sure.
